page.title: 14TRADE
page.content: Most{TRADE}is in the form of {RETAIL.} The shops are grouped in five areas at the following locations: { {QUAKERS ROAD}in DOWNEND there are eight shop, this is a list of them: MINI MARKET, BUTCHERS, GREEN GROCERS, POST OFFICE, CAR SPARES , 2 HAIR DRESSERS and a CLOTHES SHOP.There are also 3 shops at {BAUGH GARDENS }which is also in DOWNEND, there is a: PET SHOP, NEWSAGENTS and a D.I.Y SHOP. There are a few shops scattered around {WINTERBOURNE DOWN}. There is PALMERS that sells vegtables, groceries, alcohol, sweets, clothes and does shoe repairs; a HAIRDRESSERS that is called HENDERSONS; a HORSE SHOP called Porters; a FURNITURE RESTORER and a house which offers 'Bed and Breakfast'. There is also a sub_Post office.
